channel.title: terminal on sergem's personal public notebook
channel.description: Recent content in terminal on sergem's personal public notebook

item.title: Autocomplete from the history in terminal
item.description: create a file .inputrc in your home directory and put there "\e[A": history-search-backward "\e[B": history-search-forward set show-all-if-ambiguous on set completion-ignore-case on # display possible completions using different colors to indicate their file types set colored-stats On TAB: menu-complete Restart your terminal. Now you can autocomplete from history using Up and Down keys. Source
